meanings.definition: The quality of being courageous or bold.
meanings.sent1: Her gutsinesses in facing her fears inspired others to be brave.
meanings.sent2: His gutsinesses in standing up to the bully earned him respect from his peers.
meanings.sent3: The little mouse showed incredible gutsinesses when confronting the big cat.
meanings.sent4: The firefighter's gutsinesses in rushing into the burning building saved many lives.
meanings.sent5: The explorer's gutsinesses in venturing into the unknown jungle amazed everyone.

meanings.definition: The act of showing bravery or determination.
meanings.sent1: The team's gutsinesses in the final minutes of the game led to a dramatic comeback.
meanings.sent2: Her gutsinesses in pursuing her dreams despite obstacles inspired her friends.
meanings.sent3: The comedian's gutsinesses in trying out new jokes made the audience laugh.
meanings.sent4: The student's gutsinesses in asking challenging questions impressed the teacher.
meanings.sent5: The soldier's gutsinesses in the face of danger earned him a medal of honor.
